channel.title: Anti-logout
channel.description: Ive been wondering how you would log back in if for some reason you where, lets say fishing. How would scar detect that you are logged out and then log back in. Would you use a bitmap pic and when you log out, it would detect it through the bitmap image? If so how you you call on a bitmap image? Can anyone please explain this to me? :) :confused:

item.title: Anti-logout
item.dc:creator: @iruleatants iruleatants
item.description:
@iruleatants wrote:

okay i would say u would put this someone in ur code

[code]
if (findbitmap(bitmapname,x,y) then login;

[code]

then put the login procdure in your scriptâ€¦

(thanks to arkanor who just taught me that bitmap thing)

[/code][/code]

Read full topic
